pages.text: This classic nether biome is mainly populated by $(l:mobs/piglin)normal and zombified piglins$(). $(l:mobs/ghast)Ghasts$() may be found as well.$(br2)The biome itself isn't very special. $(l:blocks/netherrack)Netherrack$() everywhere, with $(l:blocks/nether_ores)nether quartz and nether gold ore$() in it, broken by bubbles of $(l:blocks/blackstone)blackstone$().
